lines.text: [translated version]
[Godzilla, Rodan, and Mothra are conversing]
Good... good heavens, it looks like they're having a conversation. Oh... Why, Shindo, what do you think they're saying to each other?
Huh, how would I know? You expect me to understand monster talk?
[translated version]
Ahhh, these monsters are as stupid as human beings!
[translated version]
[the twin fairies translate a conversation between Godzilla, Rodan and Mothra]
Oh, Godzilla, what terrible language.
[translated version]
[the police are puzzled how the princess could've survived an exploding airplane, but an expert has an opinion]

Yes, it is possible for someone to be saved from an exploding aircraft. If we understand the curvature of space, we know that the continuum surrounding any spherical body such as our world is composed of different dimensions. The force of the explosion created a gap between these dimensions, and fortunately for her, she fell into it.
[translated version]
Professor, look, it's getting big again.
Yes. According to these figures, it's bigger than it was before.
That's impossible. How can a meteorite grow?
Nevertheless, it's growing.
[translated version]
Gimme that key or I'll call the police!
Are you stupid? Have you forgotten that I AM the police?
[translated version]
Why does no one pay heed to my warning? The entire human race will parish from the Earth. When the monster Ghidrah passes, only flaming ruins are left.
lines.character: Mas Selina Salno, Princess of Sergina

lines.text: Ghidrah?

Centuries ago, the monster appeared in the skies of Mars. Within a month, the culture of Mars had been wiped out completely. The civilization on my planet had reached a stage of development which you people will not achieve for a long time. Centuries, at least. Today, because of the space monster, it is a dead world. Dead and unpopulated.
lines.character: Mas Selina Salno, Princess of Sergina

lines.text: It would be a bad situation if that creature came here to Earth.
It's worse, because he's arrived.
lines.character: Mas Selina Salno, Princess of Sergina
